Text: LOL reports your download to your internet provider. 2391 of you are going to get cease and desist e-mails.

thats a pretty big statement..
gonna back it up some how ?

So LOL provides content to people, then rats on them for accepting it. What a fucking idiot.

isn't dealing a bigger crime than using? when the cops do that its called entrapment. 

I bet that's whats going on. Thanks for the tip.

and if and when you get that letter, just stop seeding. Fucking idiot.

sarcasm aside, I've gotten stuff with an LOL tag on it before. Never got a letter from my provider. EVER. 

Thanks for the upload.

I have also downloaded "Lol" type files, for years... I seed for a while, transfer and remove..maybe that's why I never have an issue.
I don't believe that very much.
